column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My favorite dishes were their seafood ones
column4: and red pepper flakes and the seared sea scallops with leeks
column6: and jamon serrano. The sauce that the shrimp comes in is SO DELICIOUS. Be sure to ask for extra bread
column7: so you can soak up every last drop! The scallops were equally just as delicious and I loved the surprising addition of the torched oranges with all the other components. However
column8: I was really disappointed with the grilled flank steak dish
column9: which was a little dry and tough. Will be sticking to their seafood dishes
column10: which I thought were much better.
